TransactionStateContext.StakingState: When users deposit exactly 1 ETH to participate, the join function is called.
TransactionStateContext.PayoutState: When entries reach the payout threshold, payments are issued.

ExternalInteractions.TokenTransfers: Transfers of ether occur between users and the contract address during deposits and payouts.
ExternalInteractions.FeeCollection: The contract collects fees from each deposit, sent to the owner's address.
